awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  A Control and Data   Processing System for Surface Spectroscopy and Reaction     Kinetics
awd_abstract_narration: A control, data acquisition, and data processing system based on                a personal computer is being assembled from electronic                          components.  This system will permit measurement of surface                     reaction kinetics through control of the sample temperature,                    using mass spectrometry and electron energy loss spectroscopy to                monitor reaction products.                                                                                                                                      Initially, the apparatus will be used to investigate the low-                   temperature oxidation of propylene and allyl chloride on the 110                plane of silver.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
